name: X-Men Legends
synopsis: X-Men enter the realm of role-playing games with an intense story, superhero action and multiplayer modes. The story in ''X-Men Legends'' begins when the X-Men learn that Magneto has devised a plan to give mutants the power to reign supreme over humans. To save the human race from imprisonment you compose a four-person team from a roster of X-Men characters including Storm, Gambit and Wolverine. Complete each mission to strengthen your team and unlock more characters, costumes and treasures.
